sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: binds synthetic ligands that do not bind wild-type FKBP

lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:bound_moiety: FLP recombinase from the Saccharomyces cerevisiae 2u plasmid
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: FLP-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence TCTAGAAA (Turan and Bode, 2011).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: FRT
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: FRT

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Chemical induction of MAD1 localisation to a specific site in the cell (by rapamycin.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Conditional targeting of MAD1 to kinetochores is sufficient to reactivate the spindle assembly checkpoint in metaphase. Kuijt TE, Omerzu M, Saurin AT, Kops GJ. Chromosoma. 2014 Oct;123(5):471-80. doi: 10.1007/s00412-014-0458-9. Epub 2014 Apr 4. 10.1007/s00412-014-0458-9 PubMed 24695965
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: Chemical induction of MAD1 localisation to a specific site in the cell (by rapamycin & FRB)
